Reviews.Content: Nice hotel I liked this hotel a lot. It麓s small with only a few rooms but has everything you need. The room was rather big with a big bed (a bit uncomfortable - but ok) and a large bathroom with shower. It was clean and nicely decorated. There was a small breakfastroom and a terrace on which you could sit and eat your breakfast. The hotel was next to a big road with rather heavy traffic but it didn麓t disturb us, the room was quiet. The hotel is not in the absolute center of the city and a bit away from the tourist area with for example the Uffizi gallery and Ponte Vechio, but it took no more than 20-30 minutes to walk. If you go down to the river you get a beautiful walk into the center with the bridges in front of you. We never once took the bus in Florence, but it was possible. The hotel is close to the railwaystation which is very good if you arrive/leave with a heavy luggage. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. I recommend this hotel if you are looking for a nice hotel to a reasonable price and don麓t mind not staying in the absolute center of the city.
Reviews.Author: SwedenMaria

Reviews.Content: Nice B Very nice BB in Florence. I found it was pretty far away from the main attractions of Florence, like the Uffizi and the Duomo, so get a copy of the bus line or call a cab if you want to get around.My room was spacious, but there was no a/c. There was a floor fan in the room that cooled it down, though. If you have a lot of luggage, beware. There is no elevator. The bathroom was pretty big and actually had a tub. The room across the hall, though, had a strange toilet in the shower set up that I've never seen before. Luckily my traveling partner got that room. Overall the room was clean and comfortable. A bit sparse, but it didn't bother me as I was only there overnight.The owners were so nice and very helpful. My lodging for Rome had fallen through at the last minute and they called ahead to a few places and made reservations at a very reasonable, nice hotel that they knew of. I appreciated it so much!
Reviews.Author: thorpite

Reviews.Content: friendly and clean My husband and I stayed at Sogna Firenze for 3 nights in May and have nothing but positive things to say. Paolo and his wife were delightful and our room was quaint and clean. Would highly recommend this small, family run hotel if you are looking for a reasonable price, good location and very friendly staff!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: recent trip My wife and I recently stayed at the Sogna Firenze for 3 nights in April and would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The bed was two twin beds pushed toghether, ok, except that one bed was 1 inch lower than the other bed before laying on it. The sheets had several holes in them, which showed that they did not even change the sheets once during our stay as the holes were always in the same place. The shower curtain had mold on it and blew in or out with the steam causing water to go all over the bathroom floor. our bathroom was connected to the kitchen which was loud in the morning.only plus was that the hotel was close to some nice small mom and pop resturants.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: a family hotel We stayed here in early november. The owner went out of his way to help us. It is good to stay in a small family hotel where the owners care about there guests. It has a good location and a fair price. I would highly recommend it.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Loved Sogna Firenze We stayed at Sogna Firenze for six nights in Oct. 2004. What a charming little hotel. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The location was good we were able to walk to all of the tourist areas of Florence. Our hosts Paolo and Cinzia were the best. They made us feel so welcome and were always ready to help with any question or need we had. The price was a bargain especially with all of the hospitality. We would recommend this hotel and definately would stay there again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: a lovely hotel Have just returned from this lovely small hotel after a wonderful staying in Florence. Our suite was a large double ensuite room beautifully furnished and decorated. The bathroom was exceptionally clean and bright. The hotel has no restaurant but there are plenty of places nearby to choose from and the hotel owner is happy to make reservations for you if you wish. There is a continental breakfast included in the price. The owner and his wife were very kind and helpful. Hotel is only ten minutes from the station and is in easy walking distance from the city center, the Ponte Vecchio and the shopping district . Highly recommended - we would definitely stay there again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: The Sogna Firenze is a delight The Sogna Firenze is out of the way, but an easy walk to the center of Florence. We enjoyed our stay very much. The room was large and very well maintained. The owner and his family were extremely helpful and contributed greatly to our enjoyment. I would definitely stay there again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
